name: RiverCare Token Metadata Generator
description: Save the metadata templates for stewardship token and event token in RiverCare project.

views.name: gen_event_token
views.description: Return event token metadata in FA2 token_info format based on input data.

views.name: gen_stewardship_token
views.description: Return stewardship token metadata in FA2 token_info format based on input data.
